Notes: An area that consists of an invisible body of water.

Obj_arg0.Name: Push Speed
Obj_arg0.Description: The speed to push the player when inside the water area. Doesn't affect swimming on the water surface, and can get quite buggy with rotated areas

Obj_arg1.Name: Is Cold Water
Obj_arg1.Description: If set, jumping into this water will cause the player to slowly take damage from the cold.
